fulltext:
Thành Huỳnh Kiến 
Ruby on Rails developer 
Github hkthanh89 
Linkedin hkthanh 
Stackoverflow thanh 
SKILLS 
-Experience building products with RoR. 
-Experience writing tests. 
-Experience designing and developing RESTful APIs, caching, database design to 
improve performance. 
-Familiarity with refactoring and code review processes to maintain code quality 
standards. 
-Understanding of OOP, some design patterns, scalings. 
EXPERIENCE 
RoR developer, MySQUAR; HCM City, Vietnam — Apr 2016—Nov 2018 
❖MyChat: Social application built solely for Myanmar 
-Develop APIs and write tests using OAuth, RoR, ReactJS, PostgreSQL, Elasticsearch, 
RSpec, FactoryGirl, Sidekiq, Memcached, Redis. 
❖Photo/Audio Server: A server serves for uploading/resize photos, audios 
-Develop uploading audios api, help the team write tests for all APIs using NodeJS, 
Express, Mocha, Chai, Sinon, Google Cloud Storage. 
❖MingalarbarMorning: News website built solely for Myanmar 
-Develop APIs using NodeJS, Express, PostgreSQL, GraphQL. 
RoR developer, FreeRangeTechnology; HCM City, Vietnam — May 2014—Feb 2016 
❖GPDQ: Uber-like app help people making appointment with doctors. 
-Develop APIs using RoR, PostgreSQL, Google distance services, Sidekiq. 
❖Hellobacsi: Health news website for Vietnamese 
-Full stack development using RoR, PostgreSQL, Bootstrap, Responsive Web. 
❖Fightclub: Football Betting website 
-Full stack development using RoR, PostgreSQL, BackboneJS, Responsive Web, 
Sidekiq. 
RoR developer, Nexle Corporation; HCM City, Vietnam — Aug 2013—Apr 2014 
❖ProfitPlanner: A budgeting and forecasting program that uses complex algorithms to 
simplify the calculation of financial and sales activity targets 
-Full stack development using RoR, PostgreSQL, Bootstrap, jQuery, S3, Sidekiq. 
❖Dealhits & DealhitsBiz: Location-based social mobile shopping applications for 
shoppers, restaurants and retailers to engage and interact directly 
-Full stack development using RoR, MongoDB, Elasticsearch, Bootstrap, jQuery, S3, 
Sidekiq. 
RoR developer, Freelancer — Feb 2013—Jul 2013 
❖Work on freelance projects developed by RoR, PostgreSQL, FactoryGirl, RSpec, 
jQuery. 
SIDE PROJECTS 
-URL Preview API written in Go. 
-Online Test System written in RoR. 
EDUCATION 
Hoa Sen University, Vietnam — Bachelor of Information Technology, 2013

educations.major_categories: Máy tính và công nghệ thông tin
